thread.section_title: Kampala Serena Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Top notch! Superb service! Marvelous spa!
thread.title_full: Top notch! Superb service! Marvelous spa! - Review of Kampala Serena Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: Srinivasan K
title: Top notch! Superb service! Marvelous spa!
text:
Best hotel in Kampala. Extremely professional & pleasant reception!
Restaurant food & service exceptional. You find all staff always smiling & eager to help. Even the souvenir shop is very interesting.
Spa service is thoroughly professional. Clean & spacious.
Overall ambience is classic. Rooms are very cozy & large.
Expensive for sure
